definition: to crush sth by running over it
stone roller/roller and millstone/to grind/to crush/to husk
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: The brakes let go and the car crashed through the bushes at the edge of the town common, gathering speed.
sentences.chinese: 刹车松开了，汽车碾过了镇边缓冲速度的绿化栏。

sentences.english: Little boys can be run over by motor-car or they can die of some awful illness .
sentences.chinese: 小男孩会被汽车碾过或者死于某些可怕的疾病。

sentences.english: Walk like you'll run over anyone who even attempts to hassle you.
sentences.chinese: 走得像是你将会碾过任何试图超越你的人。

sentences.english: A lorry ran over Jane's cat and sped away.
sentences.chinese: 一辆卡车从简的猫咪身上碾过后逃之夭夭。

sentences.english: Drive your cart and your plow over the bones of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 大车和犁头的前行碾过死人的白骨。

sentences.english: The monotonous rhythm of wheels clicking on the trails soon lulls you to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 车轮碾过路轨发出的单调“咔嗒”声，很快催人入睡。

sentences.english: And he flipped my truck, and he shoveled it on my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我的车翻了，他们俩开着车直接碾过我的手。

sentences.english: A moment later, her terrible screams broke off as the train mowed her down.
sentences.chinese: 一瞬间，火车碾过詹妮，骇人的惨叫声戛然而止。

sentences.english: A little later a lorry rolls over her injured body.
sentences.chinese: 之后一辆卡车碾过她受伤的身体。

sentences.english: Dog carcass in alley this morning. Tire tread on burst stomach.
sentences.chinese: 早上小巷里出现狗的尸体，被轮胎拦腰碾过。

sentences.english: Dog carcass in alley this morningtire tread on burst stomach.
sentences.chinese: 早上小巷里出现狗的尸体被轮胎碾过。

sentences.english: A truck runs her over, stops momentarily, then drives away.
sentences.chinese: 一辆卡车从孩子身上碾过，停了片刻，立即开跑了。

definition: stone roller/roller and millstone/to grind/to crush/to husk
to whistle past/to hurtle past/to zip by
to crush or compact by means of a roller
to sweep past/to hurtle past/to swoosh past
loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
